title: Riot can you pls fix my lag somehow
body:
i have a really good cp but latley its been lagging a lot so is there something wrong with the client or my internet
Please help cause i dont want to get a leaver buster for lagging
and crashing

replies.body: Can you give me a bit more detail on your *lag*? This word is a pretty general catch-all, and can often describe a lot of issues. What specific behavior are you seeing and what error messages are you seeing, if any?
